title: Bloomberg Markets: Dudas on Gold as a Haven for Investors
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dudas on Gold as a Haven for Investors
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Michael S Dudas Partner and Metals & Mining Analyst Vertical Research Partners Discussing gold as haven for investors as he sees the price per ounce going higher.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
